# buildkite_pipeline_schedule (Resource)

A resource representing a pipeline schedule in Buildkite.


## Example
```hcl
resource "buildkite_pipeline" "test" {
  name = "build pipeline"
  ...
}

resource "buildkite_pipeline_schedule" "tfAccTestSchedule" {
  pipeline_id = "${buildkite_pipeline.test.id}"
  cronline = "0 0 1 1 *"
  env = {
	  KEY1 = "val1"
  }
  enabled = true
  message = "test message"
  branch = "master"
  commit = "HEAD"
  label = "build regularly"
}
```


<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- **branch** (String)
- **commit** (String)
- **cronline** (String)
- **enabled** (Boolean)
- **label** (String)
- **message** (String)
- **pipeline_id** (String)

### Optional

- **env** (Map of String)

### Read-Only
- **id** (String) The ID of this resource.
